title: In Texas Borderland, Security Is No Simple Goal
teaser: Calls for security at the border have intensified as an unprecedented number of migrant children have started crossing into the U.S. Texas Gov. Rick Perry is sending 1,000 National Guard troops to the area, but border security is more complex than it appears.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
